root: ^Most people around here call me Old Man Cornet...

WhatCanDo: ^What can I do for you youngster?
^What can you tell me about this city?
^I’m looking for keys to the gate.
^Why are you looking at that statue?
AboutTheCity: ^I’ve been here since before this city had a name. It’s walls were built as a protection against It.
^Most people today will tell you It didn’t exist, but I know better!
^A Giant Abomination of gears and flesh, created by a very foolish man.
^Although it’s been many years, I know It's still out there, waiting for us to put our guards down.
LookingAtStatue: ^That statue reminds me of an old friend…
^It’s been broken for a while now…
^The city’s been too busy to fix it…
